Set Background Standard Deviation

Source: R/methods-PSMatrix.R
ps_bg_std_dev-set-PSMatrix-method.Rd

This method updated the background standard deviation stored in a `PSMatrix` object.

# S4 method for class 'PSMatrix'
ps_bg_std_dev(x) <- value

Arguments

x

A `PSMatrix` object.

value

Numeric. The value representing the new background standard deviation.

Value

The modified `PSMatrix` object with the updated background standard deviation.

See also

ps_bg_std_dev to retrieve the background standard deviation, and validObject to see which checks are performed on the input `PSMatrix` object.

Examples

pfm1_path <- system.file("extdata", "pfm1.rds", package = "PscanR")
pfm1 <- readRDS(pfm1_path)
`ps_bg_std_dev<-`(pfm1, value = 0.08568925)
